snippet: Manchester United was held to a 2-2 draw at West Ham, as second-place Manchester City beat Wigan, 1-0, to cut United’s lead to 13 points in England’s Premier League.
lead_paragraph: Manchester United was held to a 2-2 draw at West Ham, as second-place Manchester City beat Wigan, 1-0, to cut United’s lead to 13 points in England’s Premier League.
